title: The Teenage Liberation Handbook: How to Quit School and Get a Real Life and Education
description: An estimated 700,000 American children are now taught at home. This book tells teens how to take control of their lives and get a "real life." Young people can reclaim their natural ability to teach themselves and design a personalized education program. Grace Llewellyn explains the entire process, from making the decision to quit school, to discovering the learning opportunities available.
author: Grace Llewellyn
